1. Sikap Pelajar Pancasila!
In this technological era, we can get new information fast. That information can be fact, narration, or argument. If you get new information which you think that it is strange or something else, what should you do?

pertanyaan: You must believe it without saying “don't agree”.
You check the information wheter that information is True or not.
You just believe the people's argumentation if you like with the information.
You only belive your argumentation and think you are the most right person if you give comment about the new information or news.
Ask the other wheter the information is True or not.

field.pertanyaan: 3. Which one is the correct statement about the definition of the words below?

pertanyaan: Reiteration is introducing the topic and indicating the writer's point of view.
Explanation of the writer about supporting particular topic is her/his argument.
Orientation is an introduction about the content of the text.
Reiteration is restating the writer's point of view/ to strengthen the thesis.
Topic is a particular subject that people discuss to write.

The following text is for questions 10 and 11!
Organic food is food produced naturally, without chemical substances. People tend to consume organic food because it is superior compared to non organic one.
Organic food ide healthier because they are free of chemical substances which harm our healthiness. I tis also more nutritious than non organic food. The nutrition remains in the food because it is free from chemical substances that can decrease nutrition. Moreover, organic farming using organic fertilizer to mature plants is friendly for the environment and maintains soil fertile.
Organic food is quality because it is healthier and more nutritiou. Organic farming is friendly for environment too. 
Source:Adapted from www.idr.uin-antasari.ac.id

field.pertanyaan:
The following text is for questions 12 to 15!
Recycling is a simply process of converting the waste materials into the new materials and also objects. To do this, recycling often requires both machinery andemployees to correctly sort recyclable items based on the material they're made of. This includes paper, plastic, glass, metal, and more. I tis very importance to do this to keep the natural resources and for the future generations.Here some reasons why we should do recycling.
When we recycle,we lessen disruption to the natural world. When we cut down fewver trees and forests, we are preventing harm to animals. By reducing disruption and damage to the natural world,we help preserve ecosystems and wildlife.
Some of the world's natural resources are in short supply, and when we recycle, we help conserve these natural resources. When we recycle paper, we save forests and trees. When we recycle plastic,it takes up a lot of solid waste and can take centuries to break down. In addition to this,most plastic comes from fossil fuel hydrocarbons. Recycling metals reduces the need to extract new metal ore while recycling glass reduces our need for certain raw materials like sand.
Making products from recycled materials requires less energy than making them from new,raw materials. It takes much less energy to make products out of recycled materials than from raw materials. For example, recycling one glass bottle saves enough power to light a 100-watt light bulb for four hours.
When we recycle, it reduces our need to harvest raw materials. Our increasing demand for these raw materials also displaces people who live near forests or around river systems. When we recycle,we reduce the possibility of damaging someone else's land or community.
Recycling takes up less energy, which reduces our carbon footprint and emissions. Reducing our carbon footprint helps minimize methane-release waste from landfill sites, which contributes to climate change. Recycling waste is much cheaper than regular waste collection and disposal. The more we recycle, the more money we can save. Deposit returns can also help add financial incentives to recycle. Recycling can help protect the environment while conserving natural resources. It is critical to recycle and minimize the amount of waste we are putting into the atmosphere.Doing so can help save energy,reduce landfill waste, and protect our environment.
Recycling brings communities together and helps people raise money for schools, colleges,hospitals, and more. These recycling drives make towns and cities happier and cleaner.
When communities come together to raise awareness about recycling, it teaches people about the importance of protecting the environment and how to do so. Educating people about protecting the environment can help equip future generations with the knowledge and understanding they need to reduce pollution.
Recycling creates new jobs every year. Jobs in recycling include sorters, drivers, mechanics,technicians, and more. When we recycle, we reprocess materials to make new products, reducing the amount of waste sent for incineration.
In simple words, recycling is essential to our natural environment, human. And all aspect of life.
Adapted from:https: //northhillbottledepot.ca/why-is-recycling-important-10-benefits-of-recycling/
